Our mission at Amigos Por Vida Public Charter School is to empower our students to become life-long learners and achieve academic and personal success, by providing an excellent education in a safe environment. Amigos Por Vida, where “Responsible, Respectful, Ready!” is the backbone of our learning approach!

Amigos Por Vida - Friends For Life is a Public Charter School for students in grades PK through 8. Amigos Por Vida does not discriminate against otherwise qualified students on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, national origin, or sexual orientation and makes reasonable accommodations for otherwise qualified students with disabilities.
